title: Wheelchair Skills Progressive Plan Template

phases.name: Foundation
goals: Efficient propulsion with ARC and Semi-circle
exit_criteria: No rear-tip warnings in backward wheeling

phases.name: Control & Terrain
goals: Ramps, side slopes, soft surfaces, caster pops

phases.name: Curbs & Advanced Balance
exit_criteria: Clean solo curb up with spotter standby

adaptation_rules: If safety flags (rear_tip, front_tip, collision) > threshold, de-escalate terrain difficulty and add safety drills.
If performance stable over 2 sessions, increase complexity (slope, surface, obstacles).
If common error repeats >3x, schedule focused micro-drills with targeted cues.
